body:
What you want to do is edit the file `$HOME/.profile` and put this line at the bottom:
```
export PATH=$HOME/bin:$HOME/go/bin:$PATH
export GOPATH=/path/to/gopath
```

The pkg installer *should* add `/usr/local/bin/go` to your `PATH` by adding the file `/etc/paths.d/go`. Is there nothing there?
